code: import React from"react";import aboutPic from"../assets/images/profile-pic.jpg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var About=function About(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"aboutHeader",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"About me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:aboutPic,className:"profile-photo",style:{width:"100%"},alt:"Profile Side View"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"aboutText",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"With diverse talent in many industries, newly aquired full MERN stack development skills, ample managment and consultation experience, I am eager to help in interesting web development projects available."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"On top of front-end and back-end web development, I have vast experience in restaurant design and managment, food safety and logistics, private catering, general construction, remodeling and repairs."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"When I'm not busy with work or personal projects, I enjoy cooking delicious meals, checking new cuisine in town, and outdoor adventures with my family!"})]})]});};export default About;
